modelIdentification.name: SISO-STD-001.1-2015 - Real-time Platform Reference Warfare FOM Module
modelIdentification.purpose: The RPR FOM supports interoperability for real-time, platform oriented defense simulation.
modelIdentification.description: Represents the firing and detonation of munitions.

reference.identification: Real-time Platform Reference Base FOM Module
Standard for Guidance, Rationale, and Interoperability Modalities for the Real-time Platform Reference Federation Object Model (RPR FOM) SISO-STD-001-2015 10 August 2015
IEEE Standard for Distributed Interactive Simulation - Application Protocols IEEE Std 1278.1-1995 September 21, 1995
IEEE Standard for Distributed Interactive Simulation - Application Protocols IEEE Std 1278.1a-1998 19 March 1998

interactionClass.name: WeaponFire
interactionClass.semantics: Communicates information associated with the firing or launch of a munition.

parameter.name: EventIdentifier
parameter.semantics: An ID, generated by the issuing federate, used to associate related fire and detonation events.

parameter.name: FireControlSolutionRange
parameter.semantics: The range used in the fire control solution. Zero if the range is unknown or inapplicable.

parameter.name: FireMissionIndex
parameter.semantics: A unique index to identify the fire mission (used to associate weapon fire interactions in a single fire mission).

parameter.name: FiringLocation
parameter.semantics: The location, in world coordinates, from which the munition was launched.

parameter.name: FiringObjectIdentifier
parameter.semantics: The object instance ID of the entity firing the munition.

parameter.name: FuseType
parameter.semantics: The type of fuse on the munition.

parameter.name: InitialVelocityVector
parameter.semantics: The velocity vector of the munition when fired.

parameter.name: MunitionObjectIdentifier
parameter.semantics: The object instance ID of the fired munition, if an object instance is registered.

parameter.name: MunitionType
parameter.semantics: The type of munition being fired.

parameter.name: QuantityFired
parameter.semantics: The number of rounds fired in the burst.

parameter.name: RateOfFire
parameter.semantics: The rate of fire in rounds per minute when quantity > 1. Zero otherwise.

parameter.name: TargetObjectIdentifier
parameter.semantics: The object instance ID of the intended target (if any).

parameter.name: WarheadType
parameter.semantics: The type of warhead fitted to the munition being fired.

interactionClass.name: MunitionDetonation
interactionClass.semantics: Communicates information associated with the impact or detonation of a munition

parameter.name: ArticulatedPartData
parameter.semantics: The set of articulated parts affected by the detonation (including where on the articulated part the detonation has affected).

parameter.name: DetonationLocation
parameter.semantics: The location, in world coordinates, at which the munition detonated.

parameter.name: DetonationResultCode
parameter.semantics: The type of detonation (including no detonation).

parameter.name: EventIdentifier
parameter.semantics: An ID, generated by the issuing federate, used to associate related fire and detonation events.

parameter.name: FiringObjectIdentifier
parameter.semantics: The object instance ID of the entity that fired the munition.

parameter.name: FinalVelocityVector
parameter.semantics: The velocity vector of the munition at the moment of the detonation.

parameter.name: FuseType
parameter.semantics: The type of fuse on the munition.

parameter.name: MunitionObjectIdentifier
parameter.semantics: The Object instance ID of the fired munition, if an object instance is registered.

parameter.name: MunitionType
parameter.semantics: The type of munition that is detonating.

parameter.name: QuantityFired
parameter.semantics: The number of rounds fired in the burst.

parameter.name: RateOfFire
parameter.semantics: The rate of fire in rounds per minute when quantity > 1. Zero otherwise.

parameter.name: RelativeDetonationLocation
parameter.semantics: The location of the detonation in coordinates relative to the target entity (if any).

parameter.name: TargetObjectIdentifier
parameter.semantics: The object instance ID of the entity that the munition has detonated on (if any).

parameter.name: WarheadType
parameter.semantics: The type of warhead on the munition.

note.label: RPRnoteWarfare1
note.semantics: If there is no object instance associated with the parameter, then this should be set to the empty string (no characters). Refer to SISO-STD-001 section 7.8.6 for handling empty strings.

note.label: RPRnoteWarfare2
note.semantics: This must reference a valid Object instance.
